title: Spirit
description: Valerian (Val) Howell has no intention of using the Spirit skills she was born with, until she stands over the body of another spirit worker at a murder scene.At that point she has a choice. It's either use those skills or get flattened, with the dubious help of an irritatingly attractive coworker-turned-bodyguard who just might be working for her enemies.She's tangled in a web of memories that aren't even hers, fighting an enemy she can't see with weapons she's never taught herself to use.Why can't anything dealing with Spirit be simple?
author: Lauren Ritz
